Trigger.Name: TR_USR_EFTDECLINEBATCH_BUSINESSPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE
Trigger.Description: Used to delete the common business process records associated with this record.
Trigger.CreateTriggerSQL: create trigger TR_USR_EFTDECLINEBATCH_BUSINESSPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE on dbo.USR_EFTDECLINEBATCH_BUSINESSPROCESS after delete not for replication as begin delete from dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE where BUSINESSPROCESSPARAMETERSETID in (select ID from deleted) and BUSINESSPROCESSCATALOGID = '3cb4a9f8-ede0-4497-acff-c351057f8a87'; -- guid is the ID from business process spec - see EFTDeclineBatch.BusinessProcess.xml end
